item.title: Notes: Segedy - 2015 - Using Coherence Analysis to Characterize Self-Regulated Learning Behaviours in Open-Ended Learning Environments
item.description: References Citekey: @Segedy2015-sy Segedy, J. R., Kinnebrew, J. S., & Biswas, G. (2015). Using Coherence Analysis to Characterize Self-Regulated Learning Behaviours in Open-Ended Learning Environments. Journal of Learning Analytics, 2(1), 13â€“48. Notes Nice work! So this work follows this ‘logic’: SRL is important and we have good theoretical models based on decades of research. We have Betty’s Brain as an ‘open-ended learning environment’ (note that’s different from open learning environments), where SRL is key for learner success.
